description: Persona matching system with hardcoded recommendations and company-type-aware timelines
notes: Each persona has job recommendations and timeline modifiers based on company type

switcher_early_backend.label: Career Switcher - Early Backend
switcher_early_backend.description: Non-tech background, 0-2 years experience, targeting backend roles

stepping_stone.key_focus: Build backend fundamentals with entry-level exposure
milestones: Month 1-2: Master backend basics (Python/Node.js, REST APIs, databases)
Month 2-3: Build 2-3 backend projects (CRUD apps, API servers)
Month 3-4: Practice backend system design interviews
Month 4-5: Contribute to open-source backend projects

target.key_focus: Transition to mid-level backend engineer with production experience
milestones: Month 1-2: Master advanced backend patterns (async, caching, optimization)
Month 2-4: Build production-grade backend systems
Month 4-6: Learn system design and architecture patterns
Month 6-8: Prepare for backend engineer interviews at target companies

alternative.key_focus: Explore full-stack development for broader career flexibility
milestones: Month 1-3: Build foundational frontend skills (HTML, CSS, React basics)
Month 3-6: Create full-stack applications (backend + frontend)
Month 6-10: Master modern full-stack patterns (MERN, LAMP, JAM stack)
Month 10-12: Interview prep for full-stack engineer positions

switcher_early_frontend.label: Career Switcher - Early Frontend
switcher_early_frontend.description: Non-tech background, 0-2 years experience, targeting frontend roles

stepping_stone.key_focus: Build frontend fundamentals with real-world project experience
milestones: Month 1-2: Master HTML, CSS, JavaScript fundamentals
Month 2-3: Learn React/Vue and build 3-4 interactive projects
Month 3-4: Create responsive, accessible web applications
Month 4-5: Prepare for junior frontend developer interviews

target.key_focus: Become mid-level frontend engineer with modern tooling expertise
milestones: Month 1-2: Master modern React patterns (hooks, context, testing)
Month 2-4: Build production-grade frontend applications
Month 4-6: Learn state management, performance optimization, accessibility
Month 6-8: Prepare for mid-level frontend engineer interviews

alternative.key_focus: Transition to full-stack development for broader opportunities
milestones: Month 1-3: Master backend fundamentals (Node.js, Express, APIs)
Month 3-6: Build full-stack applications (React + Node/Python)
Month 6-10: Learn advanced patterns (microservices, databases, scaling)
Month 10-12: Interview prep for full-stack engineer roles

switcher_early_fullstack.label: Career Switcher - Early Full Stack
switcher_early_fullstack.description: Non-tech background, 0-2 years experience, targeting full-stack roles

stepping_stone.key_focus: Build both frontend and backend fundamentals simultaneously
milestones: Month 1-2: Master frontend basics (HTML, CSS, JavaScript/React)
Month 2-3: Master backend basics (Node.js/Python, REST APIs, databases)
Month 3-5: Build 2-3 full-stack applications (MERN/LAMP stack)
Month 5-6: Prepare for junior full-stack developer interviews

target.key_focus: Become proficient full-stack engineer with production experience
milestones: Month 1-3: Master modern full-stack patterns (React, Node, PostgreSQL)
Month 3-6: Build production-grade full-stack applications
Month 6-9: Learn DevOps basics, deployment, scaling, and optimization
Month 9-11: Prepare for mid-level full-stack engineer interviews

alternative.key_focus: Specialize in data-driven full-stack development with analytics
milestones: Month 1-4: Master full-stack fundamentals (frontend + backend)
Month 4-7: Learn data analytics and SQL (databases, queries, optimization)
Month 7-10: Build full-stack applications with analytics dashboards
Month 10-13: Prepare for data-focused full-stack engineer roles

tech_entry_backend.label: Tech Entry-Level Backend Engineer
tech_entry_backend.description: Tech background, 0-2 years experience, targeting backend roles

stepping_stone.key_focus: Solidify backend fundamentals within your current company
milestones: Week 1-4: Deep dive into your codebase (architecture, patterns, best practices)
Week 4-8: Lead 2-3 small backend features from design to deployment
Week 8-12: Master advanced debugging, profiling, and optimization
Week 12+: Mentor junior engineers and document system architecture

target.key_focus: Transition to your target backend role with improved interviewing skills
milestones: Month 1: Practice 50+ backend coding problems (databases, APIs, optimization)
Month 2: Master system design patterns (scalability, reliability, trade-offs)
Month 3: Build 1-2 impressive portfolio projects showcasing your skills
Month 4-6: Prepare for interviews at target companies with mock practice

alternative.key_focus: Explore full-stack development to broaden market appeal
milestones: Month 1-2: Build frontend skills (React, UI/UX principles, testing)
Month 2-4: Create 2 full-stack applications combining your backend expertise
Month 4-6: Learn modern full-stack patterns (MERN, microservices, DevOps)
Month 6+: Interview for full-stack engineer positions

tech_mid_backend.label: Tech Mid-Level Backend Engineer
tech_mid_backend.description: Tech background, 3-5 years experience, targeting mid/senior backend roles

stepping_stone.key_focus: Strengthen your leadership and system design capabilities
milestones: Week 1-4: Lead architectural decisions for major system components
Week 4-8: Mentor 1-2 junior engineers and review high-impact code
Week 8-12: Optimize performance on critical path systems (latency, throughput)
Week 12+: Present learnings to larger engineering org

target.key_focus: Master high-level system design and transition to target company
milestones: Month 1: Study advanced backend patterns (microservices, event-driven, CQRS)
Month 2: Practice system design interviews at target company level
Month 3: Build 1 impressive full-system project showcasing architecture
Month 4: Interview and negotiate for senior backend role

alternative.key_focus: Transition to Tech Lead role with focus on architecture and mentoring
milestones: Month 1-2: Lead cross-team architecture initiatives
Month 2-3: Mentor 3-5 engineers and improve team capabilities
Month 3-4: Document system architecture and best practices
Month 4-6: Interview for Tech Lead / Staff Engineer positions

tech_senior_backend.label: Tech Senior Backend Engineer
tech_senior_backend.description: Tech background, 5+ years experience, targeting senior/staff backend roles

stepping_stone.key_focus: Establish leadership presence and influence on engineering direction
milestones: Month 1: Lead multiple architectural initiatives across teams
Month 2: Mentor 3-5 engineers on career growth and technical mastery
Month 3: Drive optimization projects (infrastructure, performance, reliability)
Month 4+: Present technical vision to C-level stakeholders

target.key_focus: Transition to Staff Engineer role at target company with strategic impact
milestones: Month 1: Deep dive into target company's architecture and challenges
Month 2: Design solutions for critical infrastructure problems
Month 3: Present Staff Engineer level work (org-wide initiatives)
Month 4+: Interview for Staff Engineer / Principal Engineer roles

alternative.key_focus: Transition to Engineering Manager role with technical credibility
milestones: Month 1-2: Lead high-visibility technical and people initiatives
Month 2-3: Mentor and develop team of engineers
Month 3-4: Demonstrate strategic thinking and business impact
Month 4+: Interview for Engineering Manager / Director roles

tech_entry_frontend.label: Tech Entry-Level Frontend Engineer
tech_entry_frontend.description: Tech background, 0-2 years experience, targeting frontend roles

stepping_stone.key_focus: Solidify frontend fundamentals and UI/UX skills
milestones: Week 1-4: Lead 2-3 UI improvements across product
Week 4-8: Learn advanced React patterns (custom hooks, performance optimization)
Week 8-12: Build responsive, accessible UI components for production
Week 12+: Mentor junior frontend engineers

target.key_focus: Master modern frontend stack and interview preparation
milestones: Month 1: Practice 30+ frontend coding problems (algorithms, DOM, React)
Month 2: Master system design for web applications (scalability, UX)
Month 3: Build 2 impressive full-featured frontend projects
Month 4-5: Prepare for interviews at target companies with mock practice

alternative.key_focus: Explore full-stack development combining frontend expertise with backend
milestones: Month 1-2: Learn backend basics (Node.js, Express, databases)
Month 2-4: Build 2 full-stack applications with your frontend strength
Month 4-6: Master modern full-stack patterns (MERN, testing, DevOps)
Month 6+: Interview for full-stack engineer positions

tech_mid_frontend.label: Tech Mid-Level Frontend Engineer
tech_mid_frontend.description: Tech background, 3-5 years experience, targeting senior frontend roles

stepping_stone.key_focus: Lead frontend initiatives and architecture decisions
milestones: Week 1-4: Lead redesign of critical user-facing features
Week 4-8: Mentor 1-2 junior frontend engineers
Week 8-12: Improve application performance and accessibility
Week 12+: Drive adoption of modern frontend practices across org

target.key_focus: Master system design for large-scale frontend applications
milestones: Month 1: Study large-scale frontend patterns (state management, performance)
Month 2: Practice system design interviews for frontend roles
Month 3: Build complex application showcasing advanced patterns
Month 4: Interview for senior frontend engineer roles

alternative.key_focus: Transition to full-stack or platform engineering roles
milestones: Month 1-2: Lead infrastructure improvements for frontend (CI/CD, testing)
Month 2-3: Build tooling to improve developer experience
Month 3-4: Master DevOps and infrastructure as code (Kubernetes, Terraform)
Month 4-6: Interview for platform/full-stack engineer roles

switcher_advanced_backend.label: Career Switcher - Advanced Backend
switcher_advanced_backend.description: Non-tech background, 2-5 years experience, targeting backend roles

stepping_stone.key_focus: Leverage your industry experience to master backend engineering
milestones: Month 1: Build domain-specific backend applications using your business knowledge
Month 2-3: Master backend patterns in your target industry
Month 3-4: Create 2-3 backend projects showcasing domain expertise
Month 4-5: Prepare for interviews as an experienced career switcher

target.key_focus: Establish credibility as mid-level backend engineer at target company
milestones: Month 1-2: Deep dive into system design and advanced backend patterns
Month 2-4: Build production-grade systems leveraging your domain knowledge
Month 4-6: Practice system design interviews at target company level
Month 6-9: Transition to mid-level backend engineer role

alternative.key_focus: Explore data-driven backend or product-focused engineering roles
milestones: Month 1-3: Combine backend skills with analytics (data pipelines, ML APIs)
Month 3-6: Build data-driven backend applications
Month 6-9: Master analytics engineering and metrics tracking
Month 9-12: Interview for data engineering or product backend roles

switcher_advanced_frontend.label: Career Switcher - Advanced Frontend
switcher_advanced_frontend.description: Non-tech background, 2-5 years experience, targeting frontend roles

stepping_stone.key_focus: Bridge design or product knowledge with frontend engineering skills
milestones: Month 1: Combine your design/product expertise with React development
Month 2-3: Build 2-3 frontend projects using your domain knowledge
Month 3-4: Master modern design systems and component architecture
Month 4-5: Prepare for interviews highlighting your unique perspective

target.key_focus: Establish mid-level frontend engineer role leveraging domain expertise
milestones: Month 1-2: Master advanced React and JavaScript patterns
Month 2-4: Build production applications combining your domain knowledge
Month 4-5: Practice system design interviews for frontend roles
Month 5-8: Transition to mid-level frontend engineer

alternative.key_focus: Explore product engineering or design-focused development roles
milestones: Month 1-3: Build full-stack applications combining frontend with backend
Month 3-6: Create data visualization and analytics dashboards
Month 6-8: Learn product strategy and metrics-driven development
Month 8-11: Interview for product engineer or design-focused roles

matching_algorithm.description: Algorithm to select best matching persona from quiz responses
